title: Public Storefront Browsing
description: Verify that users can browse product categories and view product listings correctly on the public storefront across devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page
Click on various product categories
Verify products are displayed correctly under each category
Check UI responsiveness on desktop, tablet, and mobile
Confirm layout and product listings adapt correctly without visual glitches

title: Product Detail and Customization
description: Verify that the product detail page displays correct information and customization options work as intended.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page
Check product images, description, price, and customization options are visible
Select sticker customization options including fonts and input text
Verify live preview updates accordingly with correct character counting
Attempt valid and invalid inputs in customization fields
Validate input restrictions and error messages are displayed properly

title: Add to Cart and Quantity Update
description: Test adding products to the cart, updating quantities, and removing items with correct discount application.

steps.description: Add multiple products including customized stickers to the cart
Confirm products appear in the cart with correct details and price
Update quantity for items in the cart
Verify updated prices reflect quantity changes accurately
Remove an item from the cart
Confirm item is removed and cart totals update correctly

title: Campaign Discount Calculations
description: Validate that campaign discounts (percentage, fixed, category-specific, product-specific, package) calculate accurately and apply correctly to products and cart totals.

steps.description: Create test campaigns in admin panel with all discount types
Apply campaigns to eligible products and add to cart
Check product prices and cart totals reflect discounts precisely
Add products not included in campaigns
Verify no discount is applied to excluded products

title: User Registration and Login
description: Ensure that user registration and login flows function correctly with input validation and session management.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Submit registration with valid data
Confirm successful registration and automatic login or confirmation message
Attempt registration with missing or invalid fields
Validate error messages for required fields and invalid inputs
Navigate to login page
Attempt login with correct credentials
Verify login success and user profile access
Attempt login with incorrect credentials
Confirm login failure and appropriate error message

title: User Profile Management
description: Test user profile update functionality including validation and persistence.

steps.description: Log in as a registered user
Navigate to profile page
Update profile details including name, email, and password
Confirm validation messages appear for invalid inputs
Submit valid updates
Verify changes persist and reflect correctly on reload

title: Secure Checkout with PayTR Test Mode
description: Validate the complete checkout process using PayTR payment gateway in test mode, ensuring no real transactions occur and proper handling of success and failure scenarios.

steps.description: Add products to cart and proceed to checkout
Fill in shipping and payment details
Initiate payment using PayTR in test mode
Confirm payment processing in test mode with no real money charged
Simulate successful payment callback
Verify order status updates to successful and confirmation page is shown
Simulate failed payment callback
Confirm appropriate error message and no order confirmation

title: Admin Panel CRUD Operations
description: Verify full CRUD functionality for products, categories, campaigns, banners, static pages, orders, users, and site settings in the admin panel.

steps.description: Login to admin panel
Create new entries for each resource type (product, category, campaign, banner, static page, user)
Verify new entries appear correctly with accurate data
Edit existing entries and save changes
Confirm updates persist and display correctly
Delete entries
Verify entries are removed from the system and UI

title: Order Tracking and Status Updates
description: Validate order tracking page functionality and order status update mechanisms for both customers and admins.

steps.description: Login as customer and navigate to order history
View detailed order tracking information
Verify order statuses and shipment tracking details are accurate and up to date
Login as admin and update order statuses
Confirm updated statuses reflect correctly on customer view

title: Form Validations on All User Inputs
description: Ensure client-side and server-side validations are correctly implemented for all forms including registration, login, checkout, product customization and admin CRUD forms.

steps.description: Attempt form submissions with missing required fields
Validate error messages appear for missing inputs
Enter incorrectly formatted data (e.g., invalid email, phone number, password rules)
Confirm validation errors appear and prevent submission
Submit valid data
Verify form submission succeeds and data is stored

title: Responsive Design Across Devices
description: Test the responsiveness of all major user flows and UI components on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Access public storefront, product pages, cart, checkout, and admin panel on desktop, tablet, and mobile
Verify that layouts adjust correctly with no overflow or UI breakage
Check that interactive elements remain usable and visible on all screen sizes

title: SEO Metadata Verification
description: Confirm that meta tags, JSON-LD schema markup, sitemap, and robots.txt are correctly generated and accessible.

steps.description: Navigate to various pages and inspect meta tags in page source
Verify that meta tag content matches expected SEO values
Access sitemap.xml and robots.txt URLs
Confirm files load correctly and contain correct entries
Verify JSON-LD structured data is present and valid on product and campaign pages

title: Media Library Management
description: Test uploading, updating, and deleting images and videos in the media library and their usage in products, banners, and static pages.

steps.description: Login to admin and open media library
Upload new images and videos
Verify media appears in library and is selectable
Assign media files to products, banners, and static pages
Confirm media renders correctly on the frontend
Delete media files
Verify media is removed from library and references handle missing media gracefully

title: Site Settings Dynamic Updates
description: Verify updates to dynamic site settings such as colors, logos, header marquee text, WhatsApp integration, and footer links are saved and applied immediately.

steps.description: Login to admin site settings page
Modify site colors, upload new logo, update WhatsApp number, edit header marquee and footer links
Confirm changes persist after save
Validate that changes reflect on all relevant frontend pages immediately

title: Static Page Content Management
description: Test the creation, update, and deletion of static pages with content editor and verify automatic footer integration.

steps.description: Create a new static page with rich text content
Verify new page is accessible on frontend with correct content
Edit content of an existing static page
Confirm updates appear correctly on frontend
Delete a static page
Validate that deleted page returns 404 or redirects properly
Check footer integration includes links to appropriate static pages

title: Order Placing and Confirmation Flow
description: Verify end-to-end order placement flow from cart to order confirmation page and email confirmation, including coupon application.

steps.description: Add products with and without campaign discounts to cart
Proceed through checkout and enter valid shipping/payment info
Complete payment simulation using the PayTR test environment
Confirm order confirmation page displays correct order details and applied discounts
Verify confirmation email is sent with accurate order data

title: Error Handling on Payment Failures
description: Verify that payment failures via PayTR are handled gracefully with user notification and no order creation.

steps.description: Start checkout and initiate payment process
Simulate a payment failure callback from PayTR
Ensure user receives clear error message indicating payment failure
Confirm no order record is created or if created, marked as failed

title: Admin Authentication and Authorization
description: Ensure only authorized users can access the admin panel and admin routes have proper authentication checks.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin panel without login
Verify redirection to login page or access denied
Login with valid admin credentials
Confirm access to all admin pages
Attempt to access admin APIs with invalid or missing tokens
Ensure all admin APIs reject unauthorized requests properly

title: Performance Under Load
description: Verify the application maintains acceptable performance and responsiveness during normal and peak user interactions.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent users browsing, customizing, and checking out products
Check page load times remain within acceptable limits
Simulate multiple admin CRUD operations simultaneously
Ensure no crashes or major slowdowns occur

title: Robots.txt and Sitemap Accessibility
description: Verify that robots.txt and sitemap.xml files are accessible and correctly configured to support SEO indexing.

steps.description: Access /robots.txt URL
Verify robots.txt loads and contains correct directives
Access /sitemap.xml URL
Confirm sitemap is well-formed and includes all relevant URLs
